name: getDomain
description: Get a domain for the authenticated user by name

name.description: A team id in case you want to act on behalf of a team

teamId.description: A team id in case you want to act on behalf of a team

$ul: **domain**: The domain information
**aliases**: Collection of aliases where the domain is used.
**boughtAt**: A timestamp to tell when the domain was purchase if it was purchased with ZEIT
**cdnEnabled**: Wether the Cloudfare CDN is enabled for the domain or not
**certs**: Collection of certs for the domain
**createdAt**: A timestamp that shows when the domain was created
**creator**: Information about who added the domain
**customerId**
**email**
**isDomainReseller**
**username**
**expiresAt**: The expiration date for the domain in case it's in ZEIT
**id**: The unique identifier of the domain.
**intendedNameservers**: The set of nameservers ZEIT requires the user to set to verify the domain with Nameservers
**name**: The domain name including the TLD
**nameservers**: The current nameservers we have detected for the domain
**nsVerifiedAt**: The timestamp of the last time the domain was verified using Nameservers
**orderedAt**: A timestamp indicating when the domain was ordered if it was purchased with ZEIT
**serviceType**: Indicates the current DNS service the domain is using
**suffix**: Tells if the domain is being used as a custom suffix for the user or team
**transferredAt**: If the domain was transferred to ZEIT, it indicates the timestamp for when the transfer was started
**txtVerifiedAt**: The timestamp of the last time the domain was verified using a TXT record
**verificationRecord**: Indicates the verification record that should be used to verify the domain using a TXT record
**verified**: Indicates if the domain ownership was already verified
**error**
**code**
**message**
**name**
